statements: SELECT * FROM grant_writing_projects WHERE project_status='completed';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM grant_writing_projects ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_description FROM grant_writing_projects WHERE team_member_id=101 ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status FROM grant_writing_projects WHERE project_status='ongoing';
SELECT * FROM grant_writing_projects WHERE project_status='pending' ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status FROM grant_writing_projects WHERE project_status = 'ongoing';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM grant_writing_projects WHERE team_member_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM grant_writing_projects WHERE project_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status FROM grant_writing_projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM grant_writing_projects WHERE project_status = 'completed'
SELECT * FROM grants;
SELECT title, agency FROM grants WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT grant_id, title, deadline FROM grants ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM collaborators WHERE role = 'Researcher';
SELECT collaborator_id, name, email FROM collaborators ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY grant_id DESC;
SELECT title, agency FROM grants WHERE title LIKE '%research%' AND agency = 'NSF';
SELECT grant_id, title, agency, deadline FROM grants INNER JOIN collaborators ON grants.grant_id = collaborators.collaborator_id;
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE agency IS NOT NULL AND deadline <= '2023-06-30' ORDER BY title ASC, grant_id DESC;
SELECT name, email, role FROM collaborators WHERE role = 'Lead Researcher' OR role = 'Research Assistant';
SELECT * FROM grant_writers;
SELECT name, email FROM grant_writers WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM grant_projects WHERE status = 'InProgress';
SELECT contributor_name, role FROM project_contributors WHERE project_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM grant_projects ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT * FROM grant_writers WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT name, email FROM grant_writers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT project_name, status FROM grant_projects WHERE deadline >= '2022-12-01';
SELECT contributor_name, role FROM project_contributors WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY contributor_name DESC;
SELECT name, email, role FROM grant_writers JOIN project_contributors ON grant_writers.id = project_contributors.contributor_id WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM grant_writers;
SELECT id, full_name, role FROM grant_writers ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT project_title, start_date FROM grant_projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT project_title, team_role FROM grant_projects JOIN project_teams ON grant_projects.project_id = project_teams.project_id;
SELECT * FROM grant_writers;
SELECT full_name, email FROM grant_writers WHERE role = 'Editor';
SELECT project_title, start_date, end_date FROM grant_projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;

SELECT project_title, member_name, team_role FROM grant_projects JOIN project_teams ON grant_projects.project_id = project_teams.project_id JOIN team_members ON project_teams.member_id = team_members.member_id;

SELECT project_title, member_name, team_role FROM grant_projects JOIN project_teams ON grant_projects.project_id = project_teams.project_id JOIN team_members ON project_teams.member_id = team_members.member_id WHERE team_role = 'Lead';
SELECT * FROM grant_writers;
SELECT writer_name, writer_email FROM grant_writers WHERE writer_department = 'Research';
SELECT project_title, project_description FROM grant_projects WHERE project_status = 'Approved';
SELECT writer_name, writer_email, writer_department FROM grant_writers ORDER BY writer_department DESC;
SELECT writer_name, writer_email, writer_department FROM grant_writers WHERE writer_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM grant_writers;
SELECT writer_name, writer_email, writer_department FROM grant_writers WHERE writer_id = 1;
SELECT project_title, project_description FROM grant_projects WHERE project_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM grant_proposals INNER JOIN grant_projects ON grant_proposals.project_id = grant_projects.project_id WHERE proposal_status = 'pending';
SELECT update_date, update_description FROM grant_updates INNER JOIN grant_comments ON grant_updates.update_id = grant_comments.update_id WHERE commenter_name = 'Alice';
